email-verification.content:
Hello,

GymBro needs to verify the email address associated with the account you created before you can join our community.

To verify your email address, click the following link:
email-verification.subject: Verify Your Email Address

password-reset.content-one:
Hello,

We've received a request to reset your password. Your temporary password is as below:
password-reset.content-two: Please click the below link to reset your password.
password-reset.subject: Reset Your Password
